turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey! Could you order me a drink from Starbucks? I can pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! Which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Place the order at 6836 Charlotte Pike in Nashville. Zip code is 37209.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do an iced skinny mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size? Tall, Grande, or Vente?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, it has skim milk, is that okay? Or would you prefer another type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's stick with skim milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, any additional flavors or anything like that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No additional flavors, but can you add an extra shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll do that. Whipped cream or anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so a grande skinny iced mocha, with skim milk, no whipped cream, extra shot of espresso. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know what, let's do a tall instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll change it to tall.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I put this on your Starbucks card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. I placed the order just now, so it will be ready in about 10 minutes at the Charlotte Pike Starbucks in Nashville. The receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're the best! Thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome!
